meta.name: description
meta.content: Dearborn Heights School District # 7 is located in Dearborn Heights, MI.

h2.a: Welcome Message for our Superintendent Jen Mast

div.div: We are so grateful you are visiting our website. We hope you find our site as welcoming as each one of our schools. Check out this video to learn more about some of the great things going on in our district. We look forward to meeting you soon!

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-vertical thumbnail-orientation-vertical

div.div: This explains the decisions that have been made regarding grades and credit during the COVID-19 school closure for elementary, middle school and high school.
The Continuity of Learning plan has been approved, and implementation will begin Monday, April 20th.
This is information regarding the 4th and FINAL opportunity for families to borrow a Chromebook for their children to use during the school closure to continue their learning.

article.aria-label: Half Day High School Only - Parent Teacher Conferences
